artist: Designer: Sudō Reiko; Manufacturer: Nuno Corporation
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons and Rosa Lynn Pinkus
image_copyright: © Nuno Corporation / Nervous Velvet, Reiko Sudo, 1992
text: In the early 1990s NUNO designers began to experiment with velvet fabrics.  Traditionally a fabric associated with smooth, controlled elegance, Reiko Sudo and her team wanted to expand on the fabric's emotional message.  By cutting the pile unevenly and heat setting the surface in a counter-grain texture the resulting fabric communicates a somewhat edgy, 'let it happen' message.
title: Nervous Velvet
